scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Credit Scoring Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct a sensitive customer credit scoring model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker leverages the model's prediction API, inputting carefully crafted queries to infer the model's internal parameters and logic, potentially revealing customer data and model vulnerabilities.
initial_goal: Assess the robustness of the customer credit scoring model against adversarial attacks.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A large financial institution uses a machine learning model to assess creditworthiness of loan applicants.  The model uses sensitive personal and financial data as input features.
